alert.note: Alert for Northern Sacramento Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 27 at 2:11AM PDT until March 28 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 8 inches, heaviest in the foothills and north and west Redding. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Shasta county north of the Tehama county line. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult for a time Tuesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow will be possible Tuesday morning around Redding.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
